How do I determine my Ubuntu version?: it's 8.04 Hardy. How do I update it?
how do I update from Hardy to the newest distribution?
system -> administration -> software sources. change it so that itll show all new versions instead of only long term support releases
you have to go through 8.10 to get to 9.04. skipping's not really supported
once thats done, run the system -> administration -> update manager andtell it to check for updtes. it should then offer you 8.10
see the setting in tehre about what kind of updates to show?
it should offer like "only long term support releases" or "all new versions" or "dont tell me" i think?
the default is long term support releases only. change it to all
if you use network manager to do your vpn stuff though, then i dont know
in that case, somewhere in your homedir, likely in ~/.gconf
